leanMethods.name: Total Quality Control (TQC)
leanMethods.description: This lean method emphasizes continuous improvement of product quality by focusing on preventing defects throughout the production process.

leanMethods.name: Just In Time (JIT)
leanMethods.description: This lean method aims to minimize waste by acquiring parts and materials only when needed for production.

leanMethods.name: Total Productive Maintenance (TPM)
leanMethods.description: This lean method focuses on proactive maintenance to avoid equipment breakdowns and ensure smooth production flow.

leanMethods.name: Orderly Workplace (OW)
leanMethods.description: This lean method cleans up your workplace and ensures that all parts are situated together so you don't waste time looking for parts.
